## Required:

- [A First Course in Bayesian Statistical Methods](https://www.amazon.com/Bayesian-Statistical-Methods-Springer-Statistics/dp/0387922997) by Peter D. Hoff.:
    + Section 7.4: Gibbs sampling of the mean and covariance
    + Section 7.5: Missing data and imputation
    + Section 7.6: Discussion and further references
